I did not realize the cabin was full of quaint antiques. The hosts put together a binder of information including details about many of the antiques and how they were obtained. The sun coming through the stained glass was beautiful, and the upstairs deck was perfect to watch a sunrise or sunset while sipping coffee or tea (which are provided). The area is beautiful and secluded. I felt completely safe there. We enjoyed walking through the woods, and our hosts have mowed trails winding through the woods where you can explore (bring bug spray!!). I loved the birdwatching room that is enclosed in windows where you can sit in the bay area and look at the birdhouses. They even had a birdwatching book and binoculars. The entire place was spotless and clean. We appreciated the mini refrigerator, microwave, stove, bowls, plates, etc. Everything you could need. The bathroom was stocked with shampoo and body wash. As other people have said, the stairs leading to the loft/bedroom are very steep so be careful. The beds themselves were super comfortable. It is pitch black at night and you can hear the crickets outside, it was the best sleep I've gotten in a long time. I couldn't believe the amazing price for this magical space, it is truly a great deal. It was lovely spending quiet evenings in the main sitting area reading all the literature provided about the area. I honestly learned quite a lot. We worked a puzzle on the kitchen table and made some really good memories on this trip. The temperature was a bit hot but the hosts have provided window A/C units and fans which made everything comfortable. I highly recommend the cabin and look forward to my next visit.
